protein.specific_function: Mediates the uptake of glutamate into synaptic vesicles at presynaptic nerve terminals of excitatory neural cells. May also mediate the transport of inorganic phosphate.

reference.reference_text: Takamori S, Malherbe P, Broger C, Jahn R: Molecular cloning and functional characterization of human vesicular glutamate transporter 3. EMBO Rep. 2002 Aug;3(8):798-803. Epub 2002 Jul 15.
